name: user_post_videos
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool tiktok_download_video.
Tool description: Tiktok Best Spider. Fast. HD Quality. Without Watermark Download. Video Full Detail. Signature X-Argus,X-Ladon,X-Gorgon 
mail: nb429429@gmail.com

API description: get user post videos for latest
get user feed
unique_id or user_id is not empty

count.description: The number of videos to fetch, with a maximum limit of 35. Default is '10'.

unique_id.description: The unique identifier of the TikTok user. Default is '@tiktok'.

cursor.description: The cursor position for pagination. Default is '0'.

user_id.description: The user ID of the TikTok user. Default is '107955'.
